title: NATIONAL DIABETES HEART HEALTH AWARENESS DAY

content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate 
proceed to the immediate consideration of S. Res. 324, submitted 
earlier today.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. The clerk will report the resolution by title.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text:
The senior assistant legislative clerk read as follows:

       A resolution (S. Res. 324) designating November 9, 2017, as 
     ``National Diabetes Heart Health Awareness Day,'' coinciding 
     with American Diabetes Month.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text:
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the 
resolution.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text:
Mr. McCONNELL. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the 
resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, and the motions to 
reconsider be considered made and laid upon the table with no 
intervening action or debate.
content.speaker: Mr. McCONNELL

content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER

content.text: The resolution (S. Res. 324) was agreed to.
content.speaker: The RECORDER

content.text:
The preamble was agreed to.
  (The resolution, with its preamble, is printed in today's Record 
under ``Submitted Resolutions.'')
content.speaker: The RECORDER

doc_title: NATIONAL DIABETES HEART HEALTH AWARENESS DAY
